CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Battery Technology Co is engaged in lithium-ion battery recycling, battery metals and material extraction, and resource production. It is a battery metals company producing low-cost battery metals with a commitment to closed-loop, clean energy technologies.
